text: Henry Wardle (1881 – 1918) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1881 births Category:1918 deaths Category:People from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:South Shields F.C. title: Harry Wardle
